normalized: about the same time.

they had the same armaments as the people who attacked asagi.

they were an independent corps lead by colonel kanda of the marine self-defence forces.
alias, the kanda brigade.
armed with cutting-edge equipment, they were a group of the self-defence forces' foremost combat experts.

originally an extraneous unit within the marine self-defence forces established to recover an island that had been captured, they were an independent force directly commanded by the prime minister of the time―to tell the plain truth, a group of mercenaries.
during the war, they maneuvered secretly, primarily by engaging in illegal activities, intelligence work, assassination officials, attacks behind enemy lines, etc.
on the other hand, the kanda brigade were known as a group of outlaws feared even by their allies.
they were suspected of repeated war crimes, including looting after the mass-killing of civilians, and raping women.
and yet, because of the merits of their superiority and ease of use, they had been appointed to a leading position by the influential people of the time.

after the war, they had been stationed on an isolated northern island, in a state almost like actual imprisonment, but even after that, influential people gave them various dirty jobs as missions, and they had capitalized upon them.
and now, again, having received the orders of prime minster asai, they had advanced to gosha village to gain control of the taimanin.
it was the first large-scale operation for the kanda brigade in a long time.
meanwhile, the taimanin who were going to ambush them were――

name: kondou
normalized: th, the operation is something we refined over and over again.
if you thought the strategy was a surprise attack to lure you to the forest, in the end, even that was a lure.
the real strategy is a simple pincer attack.
he talked nonstop, distorting his ugly face in pain and hatred even more.

name: murasaki
normalized: are you talking about the 200 guys who disappeared?
murasaki grabbed kondou by the collar.

name: kondou
normalized: guh?!

name: murasaki
normalized: the soldiers who went towards the school should have been 300.
but 100 appeared.

name: murasaki
normalized: did the remaining 200 perhaps go around behind the school?
to prevent our escape?

name: kondou
normalized: ugugu… y, you realized?!

name: murasaki
normalized: students they may be, but don't think a pincer attack of about 200 will succeed against a convoy of apprentice taimanin.
at about this time…

name: kondou
normalized: fuhaha!
this is too good!
too good!
kondou's face twisted in ecstasy.

name: kondou
normalized: as i thought, you're on that level?!
kuhahahaha, you bitches are antique taimanin after all!
though dripping with cold sweat from the pain, he burst into laughter.

name: sakura
normalized: what happened to this guy?

name: murasaki
normalized: i don't know.
going crazy――

name: sakura
normalized: mucchan!

name: murasaki
normalized: hah!
sakura and murasaki suddenly turned around.

name: kanda
normalized: that's far enough, taimanin.
new enemies had appeared.
furthermore, from behind the school building.
a man who appeared to be the commander, 5 raiden, and about 50 soldiers.

name: kanda
normalized: what a failure, captain.

name: kondou
normalized: c, colonel… kanda… guguu…

name: sakura
normalized: how, from that direction?!

name: kanda
normalized: hmph, you idiots should see this.
kanda jerked his chin.
the 5 raiden moved towards the pair and flung some things.
round things.
eight of them.
the pair gasped.
the things that were rolling over.
were freshly severed heads.
the heads of the taimanin they had placed as escorts for the students to get away by crossing the mountain.

name: sakura
normalized: th, they're?!

name: murasaki
normalized: you bastaards!

name: kondou
normalized: guhahahahaa!
kondou burst into laughter with a triumphant expression.

name: kondou
normalized: not 200.
we attacked this village with 5500, and hid half of them in the mountains.
the brats who escaped flew into the bosom of our main body of 300!

name: kanda
normalized: the brats are rebellious.
half we've killed, half we've made prisoners of war.

name: kanda
normalized: as a rule i don't take prisoners, but i'm being ordered by that man not to kill everybody.
but he probably won't say so if it looks like the resistance is fierce, will he?

name: kondou
normalized: guhaha!
the situation's turned around, hasn't it?!
gosuu!

name: kondou
normalized: ugah!
kondou fainted in agony.
peeling back his eyes, he fell prostrate on the ground face-first.
his unconscious body was trembling like a shrimp.

name: sakura
normalized: shut up, old man.
sakura said, and kicked at kondou's groin.
being shown the heads of her comrades and hearing that the students had been killed, her eyes were perfectly still.

name: sakura
normalized: i'll kill you.
she whispered.

name: murasaki
normalized: sakura.
murasaki restrained the shoulder of sakura, who was about to jump out, with her hand.

name: sakura
normalized: mu, mucchan…
sakura stopped her movement with a sound of profound regret, which filled her voice with more power than filled her shaking hands.
murasaki directly confronted kanda, the commander of the troops that had been renewed once more.

name: murasaki
normalized: what are your demands?

name: kanda
normalized: throw away your weapons and surrender.
simple, isn't it?
murasaki bit her lip.
if they didn't surrender, the lives of the students that had survived were for naught.
they knew such a thing without it being said.

name: sakura
normalized: mucchan…
sakura, who had cooled her head a little, looked at murasaki.

name: murasaki
normalized: it's my mistake… the mountain-crossing escape route was the trap from the start.
i sent the students to helplessly escape to there.

name: sakura
normalized: it's not just mucchan's fault!

name: murasaki
normalized: i guess if it were asagi-sama, she would have directed them more appropriately.

name: sakura
normalized: mucchan…

name: kanda
normalized: oi, girls.
what are you talking about?
my patience is short.

name: murasaki
normalized: sakura, i'm sorry.

name: sakura
normalized: it's okay, there will definitely be a chance.
sakura said.
as if to persuade murasaki, and herself.
thus, the pair discarded their weapons.
